short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your life on proxer more pleasant!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Long needed changes and additions to Proxer.me!

The features include:
- Dark Mode (Customizable)
- History and bookmarks on homepage for quick maneuvering
- Overall improved layouts
- Optional theater mode
- etc..

Try it out for yourself!

Disclaimer:
This extension is not affiliated with Proxer in any way.
